ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: A must for students working closely with quantum optics.
I would highly recommend that course to anyone interested in applications of quantum mechanics.

Quantum Optics is easily the most exciting field of physics. The strength of the class is that it uses a common set of tools to cover a range of physical systems in which great progress has been made recently.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: We some mathematical techniques and a lot of applications. Both of them are very helpful to understand current papers and research talks.

Together with Supercoductivity, this class served as the most important survey of the theoretical issues relating to my field of research. I expect to use most of what I learned in this class in the near future.
